content: 58 sts sleeves repeat for both row 5 *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * transfer sleeve sts from scrap yarn onto 3 us 8/5 3 more times k to end - 66 sts mm dpns equally distributing the sts onto the 3 row 7 kfb *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat needles as much as possible from * 3 more times k to last 2 sts kfb k1 - 76 sts using a 4th dpn join mc at center of underarm repeat row 3-8 1 more time - 102 sts and pick up and k 1 st then k across all sleeve sts then repeat row 3-4 3 more times - 126 sts until you are back to underarm then pick up and k then repeat row 7-8 1 more time - 136 sts 1 more st pm for bor - 32 34 38 40 42 43 45 then repeat row 3-4 3 more times - 160 sts sts then repeat row 7-8 1 more time - 170 sts join to work in the round and k 10 rnds then repeat row 3-4 3 more times - 194 sts decrease round k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 - 30 then repeat row 7-8 1 more time - 204 sts 32 36 38 40 41 43 sts work in st st in the round working the above decrease total sts not including seam sts round every 11 13 15 15 18 19 21 rnds 1 1 1 3 each front = 20 21 23 24 25 25 26 2 1 1 time s then every 10 12 14 0 17 18 20 each sleeve = 30 32 36 38 40 41 43 rnds 2 2 2 0 1 2 2 time s - 24 26 30 32 34 back = 44 46 50 52 54 56 58 35 37 sts www elizabethsmithknits com 3 next round join cc k to end row 8 rs repeat row 2 note knit the yo s as you last round switch back to mc and work as follows reach them - this creates the buttonhole sizes 2t & 5-6 only k to end row 9 ws repeat row 1 sizes 3t 4t & 6-7 only k1 k2tog k to 3 sts repeat row 8-9 1 more time before end k2tog k1 bobble in pattern size 7-8 only kfb k to end size 8-10 only k1 k2tog k to end finishing wrist ribbing weave in all ends and block to straighten out edges switch to us 7/4 5 mm dpns and shape this especially helps in the v-neck area round 1 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end attach buttons repeat round 1 until ribbing measures 1 5 /4 cm bobble in pattern front bands with us 7/4 5 mm 24 /60 cm circ join mc at bot- tom right front edge of garment pick up and knit 3 sts for every 4 row along
